EmailTemplate.name: 22AugWeb-Digital-Strategies.WeMissedYouMay16
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you - Resources from our Digital Strategies Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our “Digitial Strategies for Independent Professionals" webinar held on Thursday, August 22. Hajj Flemings, brand/tech strategist and founder of Brand Camp University, discussed apps, mobile tips, and other technological developments important to independent consultants. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-digital-strategies-independent-professionals> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Digital-Strategies-Webinar-Slides.pdf> Featured speaker Hajj Flemings website <http://hajjflemings.com/>
